about-me.about-text-3: I am a student of Applied Mathematics and Computer Science, with a strong interest in areas such as artificial intelligence, data science and statistical analysis. I am passionate about applying my knowledge to solve real-world problems and contribute to the development of innovative projects.

skills.skills-text-2: Technologies and tools I've been working with recently:

projects.projects-text-2: Here are some of the projects I've worked on recently:
projects.projects-text-3: A full-stack e-commerce website with payment integration, user authentication, and product management.
projects.projects-text-4: A responsive personal portfolio to showcase my skills, projects, and experience.
projects.projects-text-5: An interactive dashboard to visualize data insights using Python, Django, and PostgreSQL.
